resources.string: Thank You for loving and supporting Ukraine in its will to stay independent and developing country. Thank You for supporting Ukrainian people in its will to stay alive. Later, after we\'ll stop the aggression, welcome visiting Ukraine (if you are a foreigner) All the money made from this Memoriada game I will appoint to help Ukrainian army or civilians suffered. As far as possible I will try to publish confirmation of my help on the \"Google Play Apps for You\" Facebook page. You can search for that page.
